column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The Lou itself had copious amounts of cheese
column2: which was nice intermixed with some spinach
column4: and tomatoes. I do think I like the classic better because of the rich flavor. Note that the sausage seems to be one large flat piece of sausage (rather than smaller pieces). The butter crust
column5: was indeed more buttery than most
column6: but not as amazing as it sounds
